history.content:
Took it with Yu last semester. I don't want to comment on individual professors but can talk about the class. Some of my friends are taking Shewchuk version of 189 this semester and after some talk we found Shewchuk's workload was  noticeably lighter(comparable workload for each HW but Shewchuk HW is due every two week)and many topics are what many already learned in eecs126 and 127.

(Note, The following is about class not about Prof. Yu as there are two more instructors) Last semester's 189 (fall) was a bit disorganized and brutal in terms of workload. Instructors didn't offer piazza support for the first half of the class. So it's like the 300 enrolled students and another 400 people wait list quickly dropped to 200 people. And it seems the curve is also much tougher, from what students felt along with grade distribution data of different instructors. (And that's why 3x more people choose shewchuk) If I had the chance to take again I would seriously consider take it one semester later with Shewchuk to save more time. 
=========
However, despite difference in workload and curve, if you really need to take this class early to do research or intern, I still think it's worth it to challenge yourself.
=========
Took CS 189 with Sahai/Yu and was on course staff with Sahai/Listgarten
Stella is a genius in her field but through 189 and 280 I can't say I've had much luck learning from her. Her trademark is putting up a slide with a lot of terminology on it, then very quickly drawing on it with the iPad stylus in red so that you can't see anything, and then glossing over any relevant learning before rinse-and-repeating. If you are good at following along and don't mind the virtual inability to take notes while she is lecturing then it is fine, but I myself am not good at just listening to the lectures and learning much.
Listgarten was pretty good as I recall from students in Spring 2018.

Took it with Yu last semester. I don't want to comment on individual professors but can talk about the class. Has anyone taken CS 189 with either of the aforementioned professors, and can comment on how the class was like compared to Shewchuk's course?
history.subject: CS 189 with Listgarten and Yu?
